section.p: Acceptance to perform test requested on the specimen submitted , such as of tissue, blood, or urine, used for analysis and diagnosis.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Identifies the status of the coded value.

Contains zero or one [0..1] specimenCollectionRequest, where its type is Specimen Collection Request
The gathering of specimens for use in testing, examination, or study based upon a request (order).<a urine specimen>.
An association from SpecimentCollectionPromise to SpecimenCollectionRequest identifying the specimen collection request.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Identifies the status of the coded value.

Contains zero or one [0..1] specimenCollectionRequest, where its type is Specimen Collection Request
The gathering of specimens for use in testing, examination, or study based upon a request (order).<a urine specimen>.
An association from SpecimentCollectionPromise to SpecimenCollectionRequest identifying the specimen collection request.
